codeSystems.name: SNOMEDCTBodyStructures
codeSystems.title: SNOMED CT Body Structures
codeSystems.description: This value set includes all codes from [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 442083009 (Anatomical or acquired body site (body structure)).

codeSystems.name: ConditionCategoryCodes
codeSystems.title: Condition Category Codes
codeSystems.description: Preferred value set for Condition Categories.

codeSystems.name: ConditionClinicalStatusCodes
codeSystems.title: Condition Clinical Status Codes
codeSystems.description: Preferred value set for Condition Clinical Status.

codeSystems.name: Condition/Problem/DiagnosisCodes
codeSystems.title: Condition/Problem/Diagnosis Codes
codeSystems.description: Example value set for Condition/Problem/Diagnosis codes.

codeSystems.name: Condition/DiagnosisSeverity
codeSystems.title: Condition/Diagnosis Severity
codeSystems.description: Preferred value set for Condition/Diagnosis severity grading.

codeSystems.name: ConditionStage
codeSystems.title: Condition Stage
codeSystems.description: Example value set for stages of cancer and other conditions.

codeSystems.name: ConditionStageType
codeSystems.title: Condition Stage Type
codeSystems.description: Example value set for the type of stages of cancer and other conditions

codeSystems.name: ConditionVerificationStatus
codeSystems.title: ConditionVerificationStatus
codeSystems.description: The verification status to support or decline the clinical status of the condition or diagnosis.

codeSystems.name: Identifier Type Codes
codeSystems.title: IdentifierType
codeSystems.description: A coded type for an identifier that can be used to determine which identifier to use for a specific purpose.

codeSystems.name: CommonLanguages
codeSystems.title: Common Languages
codeSystems.description: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

codeSystems.name: ManifestationAndSymptomCodes
codeSystems.title: Manifestation and Symptom Codes
codeSystems.description: Example value set for Manifestation and Symptom codes.

codeSystems.name: Marital Status Codes
codeSystems.title: MaritalStatus
codeSystems.description: This value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate the marital status of a person.

codeSystems.name: PatientContactRelationship
codeSystems.title: Patient Contact Relationship
codeSystems.description: The nature of the relationship between the patient and the contact person.

codeSystems.name: AssistanceNeedsValueSet
codeSystems.title: Assistance Needs ValueSet
codeSystems.description: A ValueSet including all codes from the Assistance Needs CodeSystem.
